Ice and Mustex reach the rendevous point where the others are waiting.

Lun=
arpine caught Mustex's scent on the ocean breeze as Ice aproaches. Ice land=
ed and Lunarpine took a defensive stance. "You were followed." He states as=
 Mustex aproaches.
"Don't worry love, he's not with the alliance. He says h=
e's a friend." Ice answers putting a wing in front of her wolf boyfriend be=
fore he can react.

Mustex lands stepping back cautiously. "I thought we we=
re going back to your base." he questions wondering why they stopped. 
"We =
will," Ice answers "But I had to meet my friends first to tell them whats g=
oing on." She could tell that he was confused but she couldn't risk radio c=
ontact so close to the alliance base to tell the other mutants she had comp=
any.
"We found signs of Silver Scout" Razor Claw interjected setting the co=
nversation back on the reason they were there. "She went off in that direct=
ion." The raptor pointed one of his stumpy arms somewhat north.
"It would s=
eem that she found one of my old aquaintances" Foxfingers interupted the ch=
at, his defenses would keep them hidden but he didn't want to take the chan=
ce of any dumb luck happening again. Ice was hidden but Mustex somehow stum=
bled onto her. He didn't want to chance that anyone else would have that ki=
nd of luck.

"So what now boss?" Razor Claw asked looking at Ice with eyes =
of a lost puppy. Veratis had put her in charge and as long as his commander=
 was present he didn't think for himself.
Ice hadn't thought that far ahead=
, her team wouldn't trust Mustex since they didn't know him, and she couldn=
't jeapordize the mission by taking him along. "I'll take him back to base,=
 you three follow our leads." She turned and got ready to fly away when she=
 caught Razor Claws next thought. "Lunarpines in charge, I'll meet you when=
 I'm done." The large white arctic owl spread her wings and flew skyward me=
ntally calling back to Mustex "Follow me."
Mustex flew skyward behind the o=
wl trying to see behind him that the other mutants weren't following them.
